entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 60 this morning. High 6. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Thursday 27 April 2023
